report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Taxon Group
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of species and occurrences within them. Optional date range and survey filters.
report.query: SELECT cttl.taxon_group as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxon_group_id WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY taxongroup UNION SELECT 'Total' as taxongroup, count(DISTINCT o.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.record_status<>'R' AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
